packages.name: Cool Daman Getaway
packages.location: Daman, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, India
packages.description: Experience the serene coastline and Portuguese charm of Daman on this 2-day getaway. Visit historical forts, peaceful beaches, and cultural monuments. Includes hotel stay, guided tours, and round-trip transportation from Vapi.

itinerary.title: Historic Forts and Nature
itinerary.description: Kick off the journey with visits to Moti Daman Fort, relaxing moments at Jampore Beach, birdwatching at Daman Aviary, and sunset at Daman Lighthouse.

itinerary.title: Cultural and Colonial Exploration
itinerary.description: Explore the heritage sites including Cathedral of Bom Jesus, Nani Daman Fort, St. Jerome Fort, and the tranquil Dominican Monastery.

packages.name: Bali Bliss
packages.description: Discover the magic of Bali on this 6-day journey through its stunning temples, lush rice terraces, waterfalls, and cultural gems. Perfect for nature lovers, spiritual seekers, and adventure enthusiasts.

itinerary.title: Temples & Beaches
itinerary.description: Visit Uluwatu Temple and Tanah Lot Temple. Relax at Padang Padang Beach and enjoy local beachside cafes.

itinerary.title: Waterfalls & Rice Terraces
itinerary.description: Explore Tegallalang Rice Terrace, Tukad Cepung Waterfall, and Tibumana Waterfall. Dine at a local restaurant.

itinerary.title: Wildlife & Culture
itinerary.description: Visit Bali Bird Park, Monkey Forest Ubud, and Garuda Wisnu Kencana Cultural Park.

itinerary.title: Spiritual & Coastal Views
itinerary.description: Tour Besakih Temple, relax at Balangan Beach, and enjoy a local Warung meal.

itinerary.title: Adventure & Wildlife
itinerary.description: Visit Mount Batur and Bali Zoo. Lunch at a local restaurant near the attractions.

itinerary.title: Markets & Departure
itinerary.description: Explore Ubud Art Market, Sukawati Art Market, and Taman Sari Market. Depart for India.

packages.name: Dwarka Darshan
packages.description: Experience a divine 4-day pilgrimage to the sacred city of Dwarka. Explore temples, holy lakes, beaches, and historical sites with seamless transport and virtual travel assistance included.

itinerary.title: Temple Start
itinerary.description: Visit the sacred Dwarkadhish Temple, walk along Dwarka Beach, and offer prayers at Gita Temple.

itinerary.title: Island and Jyotirling
itinerary.description: Explore Beyt Dwarka island, visit Nageshwar Jyotirling, Gopi Lake, Mayasar Lake, and Bhadkeshwar Mahadev Temple.

itinerary.title: Shoreline Serenity
itinerary.description: Walk along Gomti Ghat, visit Sudama Setu & Mandir, climb Dwarka Lighthouse, relax at Shivrajpur Beach, and see Rukmani Devi Temple.

itinerary.title: Return Journey
itinerary.description: Round-trip train travel and departure from Dwarka with spiritual memories and blessings.

packages.name: Goa Getaway
packages.description: Enjoy a 3-day vibrant escape to Goa packed with beaches, forts, churches, shopping, and delicious Goan cuisine. Choose between flight or train travel and immerse yourself in the tropical vibe.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Local Markets
itinerary.description: Relish Goan cuisine, check into your hotel, and explore the colorful local markets.

itinerary.title: Beaches and Forts
itinerary.description: Spend the day at Aguada Fort, Siquerium, Baga, Anjuna, and Vagator Beach.

itinerary.title: Spiritual and Scenic
itinerary.description: Visit Shri Mangesh Temple, Bom Jesus Basilica, Se Cathedral, Miramar Beach, and Dona Paula.

packages.name: Hong Kong & Macau Tour
packages.description: Discover the perfect blend of urban adventure and cultural charm in this 7-day Hong Kong & Macau package. Enjoy panoramic views, thrilling rides, iconic landmarks, and vibrant nightlife. Includes hotel stay, guided tours, and seamless transfers.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Relaxation
itinerary.description: Arrival in Hong Kong. Transfer to hotel and relax. Prepare for the exciting week ahead.

itinerary.title: Peak Tram & Skyline Views
itinerary.description: Ride the iconic Peak Tram to Sky Terrace 428, followed by a scenic Star Ferry ride. End the evening at Temple Street Night Market.

itinerary.title: Free Exploration
itinerary.description: Day free for personal shopping or optional city exploration (activities not listed in PDF).

itinerary.title: Transfer to Macau
itinerary.description: Travel from Hong Kong to Macau. Leisure time and hotel check-in.

itinerary.title: Heritage and Skyscrapers
itinerary.description: Visit Monte Fort & Macau Museum in the morning, A-Ma Temple in the afternoon, and end at the Macau Tower Observation Deck.

itinerary.title: Luxury Experience
itinerary.description: Ride a gondola at The Venetian Macao, explore the Eiffel Tower replica at The Parisian, and enjoy nightlife on Cotai Strip.

itinerary.title: Farewell and Departure
itinerary.description: Visit the Macau Giant Panda Pavilion in the morning and transfer to the airport/ferry terminal for departure.

packages.name: Kashi Darshan
packages.description: Immerse yourself in the spiritual heart of India on this 4-day Kashi pilgrimage. Visit sacred temples, witness the majestic Ganga Aarti, explore historical sites like Sarnath, and stroll through iconic ghats and markets.

itinerary.title: Ghat and Temple Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Kashi Vishwanath Temple, Dashashwamedh Ghat, Assi Ghat, Manikarnika Ghat, and experience Ganga Aarti.

itinerary.title: Cultural Wonders
itinerary.description: Visit Ramnagar Fort, Meer Ghat, Tulsi Ghat, Subah-e-Banaras, Sankat Mochan Temple and local markets.

itinerary.title: Heritage Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Sarnath, Ashoka Pillar, Statue of Buddha, Namo Ghat, and attend the Light & Sound Show.

itinerary.title: Local Varanasi
itinerary.description: Visit Deendayal Statue, Thatheri Bazar, Vishwanath Lane, Godowlia Market and Golghar.

packages.name: Mahakal Darshan (Ujjain)
packages.description: Explore the sacred land of Ujjain in this 4-day Mahakal Darshan tour. Witness divine Jyotirlinga rituals, sacred temples, river ghats, and spiritual architecture of Mahakal Lok Corridor.

itinerary.title: Jyotirlinga Blessings
itinerary.description: Visit Mahakaleshwar Jyotirlinga, Harsiddhi Temple, Ram Ghat, Kaal Bhairav, and Mangalnath Temple.

itinerary.title: City Landmarks
itinerary.description: Explore Jantar Mantar, Kaliadeh Palace, ISKCON Temple, Bharat Mata Mandir, and Triveni Museum.

itinerary.title: Spiritual Sites
itinerary.description: Visit Vishnu Sagar, Gaghkalika Mandir, Bhartihari Caves, and Shri Chaubis Khamba Mata Temple.

itinerary.title: Mahakal Lok Walk
itinerary.description: End the tour at Mahakaal Lok Corridor, Vikram Kirti Mandir, and Mahamrityunjay Dwar.

packages.name: Matheran Nature Trip
packages.description: Reconnect with nature on this tranquil Matheran escape. Discover waterfalls, lakes, temples, and sunset viewpoints, all nestled in this eco-friendly hill station.

itinerary.title: Lakes and Temples
itinerary.description: Visit Echo Point, Charlotte Lake, Pisarnath Temple, and Louisa Point. Explore the Shivaji Museum.

itinerary.title: Scenic Views
itinerary.description: Cover One Tree Hill, Alexander Point, Panorama Point, Dodhani Waterfall, and Monkey Point.

itinerary.title: Hilltop Retreat
itinerary.description: Visit Khandala Point and enjoy peaceful time in nature before departure.

packages.name: Mount Abu Package
packages.description: Escape to the serene hills of Mount Abu. Discover temples, lakes, and viewpoints in this 3-day package with guided sightseeing, boat rides, and cozy stays.

itinerary.title: Lakeside Wonders
itinerary.description: Visit Nakki Lake, Toad Rock, Bharat Mata, Government Museum and enjoy sunset views.

itinerary.title: Temples and Shopping
itinerary.description: Explore the sacred Dilwara Temple, Adhar Devi Temple, and shop at Mount Abu Bazaar.

itinerary.title: Hilltop Vibes
itinerary.description: Visit Gabbar Hill, Ambaji Mata Mandir, and enjoy some local shopping before departure.

packages.name: Oman Odyssey
packages.description: Discover the magic of Oman in this 5-day exotic getaway. From stunning mosques and souks in Muscat to snorkeling at Daymaniyat Islands, wadis, sinkholes, and desert adventures â€“ this trip offers the perfect blend of luxury, culture, and nature.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Muscat City Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque, Royal Opera House, Mutrah Fort, and explore the vibrant Mutrah Souk Market. Overnight stay in Muscat.

itinerary.title: Island Adventure
itinerary.description: Enjoy a boat trip and optional snorkeling experience at Daymaniyat Islands. Return and overnight stay in Muscat.

itinerary.title: Wadis and Sinkholes
itinerary.description: Full-day guided tour of Wadi Shab and Bimmah Sinkhole. Optional Dhow Cruise experience in the evening.

itinerary.title: Local Culture and Beaches
itinerary.description: Explore Muscat beaches, try dune bashing, and optionally visit Nizwa Fort. Evening transfer to airport.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Early morning flight back to India. End of a memorable Arabian journey.

packages.name: Pushkar Tour
packages.description: Explore the spiritual charm of Pushkar on this 5-day cultural journey. Visit sacred lakes, vibrant bazaars, ancient temples, and serene hills. Perfect for a peaceful and spiritual getaway.

itinerary.title: Lakeside Serenity
itinerary.description: Begin with Pushkar Lake, Brahma Temple, and explore the Main Bazaar.

itinerary.title: Spiritual Trails
itinerary.description: Visit Savitri Temple, Varaha Temple, and Sarafa Bazaar.

itinerary.title: Palaces & Bazaars
itinerary.description: Explore Ranji Temple, Man Mahal, and Bada Bazaar.

itinerary.title: Hill & Garden Walks
itinerary.description: Visit Gurudwara Singh Sabha, Naga Pahar, Rose Garden, and Sadar Bazaar.

itinerary.title: Shopping & Farewell
itinerary.description: Final shopping stop at Kishanpura Market before departure.

packages.name: Udaipur Royal Escapade
packages.description: Indulge in royalty with this 5-day tour through Udaipur, the City of Lakes. Explore majestic palaces, tranquil lakes, heritage museums, and spiritual sites with stunning landscapes and rich Rajasthani culture.

itinerary.title: Palaces and Lakes
itinerary.description: Start your tour with the City Palace, Jagdish Temple, Lake Pichola, Jagmandir, and Fateh Sagar Lake.

itinerary.title: Monsoon Palace & Gardens
itinerary.description: Visit the iconic Lake Palace, Saheliyon Ki Bari, Sajjangarh Palace, Wildlife Sanctuary, and Bahubali Hills.

itinerary.title: Museum and History
itinerary.description: Explore the Vintage Car Museum, Ahar Museum, Wax Museum, and Maharana Pratap Smarak.

itinerary.title: Lakeside Leisure
itinerary.description: Relax at Fateh Sagar Pal, visit Nehru Garden, Rajiv Gandhi Garden, Shilpgram, and Ambrai Ghat.

itinerary.title: Temples and Culture
itinerary.description: End your tour with visits to Karni Mata Mandir, Bagore Ki Haveli, Eklingji Temple, Sahastra Bahu Temple, and local markets.

packages.name: Saputara 2D 1N Tour
packages.description: Escape into nature with this short and scenic getaway to Saputara. A perfect 2-day tour packed with lakes, viewpoints, gardens, and tribal culture. Includes premium stay and guided sightseeing.

itinerary.title: Lakes & Landscapes
itinerary.description: Explore Saputara Lake, Lake Garden, Nageshwar Mahadev Temple, Table Land & Ropeway, Step Garden, and Sunset Point.

itinerary.title: Cultural Exploration
itinerary.description: Start your day with Sunrise Point, followed by Echo Point, Rose Garden, Tribal Museum, and Artist Village.

packages.name: Shimla & Manali
packages.description: This 6-day journey through Shimla and Manali brings you the best of Himachal Pradesh. From colonial charm and scenic valleys to thrilling adventures in snow-clad mountains, experience nature, culture, and calm all in one trip.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Shimla
itinerary.description: Arrive in Shimla and explore the Ridge, Mall Road, Christ Church, Kali Bari Temple, and enjoy the sunset view.

itinerary.title: Historical & Cultural Sites
itinerary.description: Visit Sankat Mochan Temple, Himalayan Bird Park, Tara Devi Temple, Viceregal Lodge, and Kamna Devi Temple.

itinerary.title: Scenic Transfer to Manali
itinerary.description: Transfer from Shimla to Manali via scenic stops, visiting Naggar Castle en route.

itinerary.title: Nature & Culture of Manali
itinerary.description: Visit Hidimba Devi Temple, Vashisht Hot Springs, Jogini Waterfall, and local markets.

itinerary.title: Adventure & Snow
itinerary.description: Explore Solang Valley, Rohtang Pass (weather dependent), and Nehru Kund.

itinerary.title: Wildlife & Return
itinerary.description: Visit Manali Sanctuary and return to Shimla for departure.

packages.name: Udaipur to Mount Abu
packages.description: Experience the royal heritage of Udaipur and the serene beauty of Mount Abu in this 6-day journey. Explore palaces, lakes, temples, and hilltop views while discovering Rajasthan's cultural and natural gems.

itinerary.title: Udaipur City Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Udaipur's iconic landmarks including City Palace, Jagdish Temple, Lake Pichola, Jagmandir, and Gangaur Ghat.

itinerary.title: Lakes and Gardens
itinerary.description: Visit Lake Palace, Saheliyon Ki Bari, Fateh Sagar Lake, Ambarai Ghat, and shop at the local market.

itinerary.title: Cultural Heritage
itinerary.description: Explore Chetak Samadhi, Mahakali Mandir, Maharana Pratap Museum, and Maharana Pratap Caves.

itinerary.title: Journey to Mount Abu
itinerary.description: Travel to Mount Abu and visit Nakki Lake, Toad Rock, and Sunset Point.

itinerary.title: Temples & Forts
itinerary.description: Visit the sacred Dilwara Temple, Adhar Devi Temple, Achalgarh Fort, Government Museum, and shop at Mount Abu Bazaar.

itinerary.title: Wildlife & Return
itinerary.description: Explore the Mount Abu Wildlife Sanctuary and enjoy treks before traveling back to Udaipur.

packages.name: Thrilling Thailand
packages.description: Embark on a 6-day adventure across Thailand's top destinations: Phuket, Krabi, and Bangkok. From serene beaches and spiritual landmarks to bustling city streets and cultural treasures, experience the thrill and charm of Thailand in one perfect holiday.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Phuket
itinerary.description: Check in to your hotel and explore the popular Patong area known for its nightlife and beaches.

itinerary.title: Phuket Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Discover Phuket's famous attractions including the Tiger Kingdom, Big Buddha, and Chaitharaman Temple.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Krabi & Phi Phi Islands
itinerary.description: Travel to Krabi and enjoy a scenic day exploring the famous Phi Phi Islands.

itinerary.title: Spiritual & Nature Tour in Krabi
itinerary.description: Visit Tiger Cave Temple, Elephant Sanctuary, and Wat Kaew Korawaram in Krabi.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bangkok & City Tour
itinerary.description: Arrive in Bangkok and explore the city's iconic temples and vibrant culture.

itinerary.title: Bangkok Highlights & Departure
itinerary.description: Visit Wat Pho, Ocean World, and the Grand Palace before your journey ends.

packages.name: Udaipur Majestic Journey
packages.description: Explore the regal beauty of Udaipur over 5 enriching days. This journey takes you through royal palaces, tranquil lakes, majestic forts, and cultural landmarks, giving you a taste of Rajasthan's timeless elegance.

itinerary.title: Royal Welcome in Udaipur
itinerary.description: Visit City Palace, Jagdish Temple, Lake Pichola, Jagmandir, and Gangaur Ghat for a royal experience.

itinerary.title: Gardens & Lakes
itinerary.description: Explore Lake Palace, Saheliyon Ki Bari, Fateh Sagar Lake, Ambarai Ghat, and shop in the local market.

itinerary.title: Museums & Memorials
itinerary.description: Visit the Vintage Car Museum, Ahar Museum, Wax Museum, Maharana Pratap Smarak, and Under the Sun Aquarium.

itinerary.title: Historical Sites
itinerary.description: Discover Chetak Samadhi, Mahakali Mandir, Maharana Pratap Museum, and Haldighati's historic sites.

itinerary.title: Fort & Farewell
itinerary.description: End your journey with a visit to Kumbhalgarh Fort, Karni Mata Mandir, Nehru Garden, and local shopping.

packages.name: Udaipur Splendor
packages.description: This 5-day heritage tour of Udaipur unveils the regal charm, historic landmarks, serene lakes, and vibrant culture of the City of Lakes. Discover palaces, museums, gardens, and the soul of Rajasthan with comfort and elegance.

itinerary.title: Royal Beginnings
itinerary.description: Kickstart the journey by visiting Udaipur City Palace, Jagdish Temple, Lake Pichola, Jagmandir, and Gangaur Ghat.

itinerary.title: Palaces and Wildlife
itinerary.description: Explore Lake Palace, Saheliyon Ki Bari, Sajjangarh Palace, Sajjangarh Wildlife Sanctuary, and Fateh Sagar Lake.

itinerary.title: Museums & Memorials
itinerary.description: Visit the Vintage Car Museum, Ahar Museum, Wax Museum, Maharana Pratap Smarak, and Under the Sun Aquarium.

itinerary.title: Lakeside Gardens
itinerary.description: Relax at Fateh Sagar Pal, Nehru Garden, Rajiv Gandhi Garden, Shilpgram, and Ambarai Ghat.

itinerary.title: Cultural Wrap-up
itinerary.description: Wrap up the journey with a visit to Karni Mata Mandir and enjoy shopping in the local market.

packages.name: Somnath Darshan
packages.description: Dive into divine tranquility on this 4-day spiritual journey to Somnath. Witness sacred temples, coastal beauty, and mythological sites that connect you to India's deep-rooted cultural and spiritual heritage.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Darshan
itinerary.description: Arrive at Somnath, check-in to hotel, visit Somnath Temple for Sandhya Aarti and receive Prasadam.

itinerary.title: Seaside Pilgrimage
itinerary.description: Explore Somnath Beach, Bhalka Tirth, Prabhas Patan Museum, Triveni Sangam, and enjoy the Light & Sound Show.

itinerary.title: Mythological Sites
itinerary.description: Visit Suraj Mandir, Laxmi-Narayan Temple, Dehotsarg Tirth, Gita Mandir, and relax with a Sunset View.

itinerary.title: Final Blessings & Departure
itinerary.description: Attend Mangal Aarti at Somnath Temple, receive Prasadam, and visit the beach before departure.

packages.name: Singapore Delight
packages.description: This 6-day trip to Singapore blends futuristic skylines, theme park thrills, and rich cultural experiences. Enjoy the iconic Marina Bay, Sentosa's fun, and the charm of a global city that's clean, green, and stunningly modern.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Cityscape Drive
itinerary.description: Arrive in Singapore, check in, and enjoy a night city drive including Marina Bay Sands and Clarke Quay.

itinerary.title: City Tour & Merlion Park
itinerary.description: Explore Singapore's famous landmarks including Merlion Park, Orchard Road, and Chinatown.

itinerary.title: Sentosa Island Adventures
itinerary.description: Full-day at Sentosa Island with attractions like S.E.A. Aquarium, Wings of Time, and cable car ride.

itinerary.title: Universal Studios
itinerary.description: Spend a thrilling day at Universal Studios Singapore enjoying themed rides and entertainment.

itinerary.title: Nature & Night Safari
itinerary.description: Visit Gardens by the Bay and experience Singapore's famous Night Safari tour.

itinerary.title: Leisure & Departure
itinerary.description: Free time for shopping or leisure activities before airport transfer and departure.

packages.name: Vrindavan Darshan
packages.description: Experience the spiritual bliss of Vrindavan on this 5-day journey. Explore sacred temples, lively bazaars, and mystical ghats as you connect with the eternal love of Radha-Krishna in the divine land of Braj.

itinerary.title: Divine Beginnings
itinerary.description: Visit the beautiful Prem Mandir and stroll through its garden, then explore Banke Bihari Market.

itinerary.title: Sacred Temples & Shopping
itinerary.description: Seek blessings at ISKCON Vrindavan and Banke Bihari Mandir, followed by shopping at Loi Bazaar.

itinerary.title: Mythical Legends
itinerary.description: Explore Radha Raman Temple, Katyayani Peeth, Nidhivan, and Radha Madan Mohan Temple.

itinerary.title: Riverfront Wonders
itinerary.description: Visit Jugal Ghat, the holy Vrindavan Dham, and explore the vibrant Vrindavan Market.

itinerary.title: Serenity at Keshi Ghat
itinerary.description: Spend your final day soaking in the tranquil vibes of Keshi Ghat before departure.

packages.name: Luxury Vietnam
packages.location: Hanoi & Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
packages.description: Experience the best of Vietnam on this 7-day luxury escape. From iconic cities and serene beaches to heritage towns and floating cruises, enjoy 4-star stays, domestic flights, and curated cultural experiences throughout your journey.

itinerary.title: Welcome to Hanoi
itinerary.description: Explore Hanoi's iconic sites: One Pillar Pagoda, Tran Que Pagoda, Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum, and Train Street.

itinerary.title: Halong Bay Cruise
itinerary.description: Cruise through Halong Bay with cave exploration, kayaking, and an overnight stay on board.

itinerary.title: Da Nang & Hoi An
itinerary.description: Fly to Da Nang, visit Dragon Bridge, Cham Museum, and enjoy the lantern-lit town of Hoi An.
activities: Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture

itinerary.title: Bana Hills & Golden Bridge
itinerary.description: Experience the iconic Golden Bridge, take a scenic cable ride, and explore the indoor amusement park.

itinerary.title: Island Life â€“ Phu Quoc
itinerary.description: Discover Starfish Beach, Phu Quoc National Park, Dinh Cau Market, and temple visits.

itinerary.title: Ho Chi Minh City Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Independence Palace, Ben Thanh Market, Walking Street, and the famous Chu Chi Tunnels.

itinerary.title: Shopping & Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy last-minute shopping at Ho Chi Minh City Centre before your return flight.

packages.name: Vietnam Budget Tour
packages.description: Discover the vibrant culture, historical landmarks, and breathtaking views of Vietnam on a 5-day budget-friendly journey. Perfectly designed for travelers who want comfort, value, and unforgettable moments.

itinerary.title: Hanoi Heritage Tour
itinerary.description: Begin your journey with Hanoi's top cultural sites including pagodas, mausoleums, and vibrant markets.

itinerary.title: Da Nang & Hoi An
itinerary.description: Enjoy river rides and explore Da Nang's famous Dragon Bridge and cultural museums.
activities: Da Nang Museum of Cham Sculpture

itinerary.title: Golden Bridge Experience
itinerary.description: A day of thrill at Bana Hills with Golden Bridge, cable rides, and amusement park fun.

itinerary.title: Ho Chi Minh Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit key attractions like Independence Palace, bustling Ben Thanh Market, and Cu Chi Tunnels.

itinerary.title: City Shopping & Departure
itinerary.description: Wrap up with shopping in the local city markets of Ho Chi Minh before heading home.

packages.name: Gangtok & Darjeeling
packages.description: Experience the serenity and charm of Gangtok and Darjeeling in this 5-day Himalayan escape. From sacred lakes and monasteries to sunrise views from Tiger Hill and vibrant local culture, this journey blends spirituality, nature, and adventure perfectly.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Gangtok
itinerary.description: Arrive at Bagdogra and travel to Gangtok via a scenic drive. Check into your hotel and relax.

itinerary.title: Excursion to Changu Lake & Baba Mandir
itinerary.description: Visit the beautiful glacial Changu Lake and pay respects at the New Baba Mandir.

itinerary.title: Monasteries & Transfer to Darjeeling
itinerary.description: Explore Enchery Monastery and Bakthang Waterfall before driving to Darjeeling.

itinerary.title: Darjeeling Local Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Catch the sunrise at Tiger Hill, followed by Batasia Loop, Zoological Park, Tenzing Rock, HMI, Peace Pagoda, and Japanese Temple.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Return from Darjeeling with beautiful memories of the Himalayas.

packages.name: Char Dham Yatra
packages.description: Embark on a divine 10-day journey through Uttarakhand to visit the sacred Char Dhams â€“ Yamunotri, Gangotri, Kedarnath, and Badrinath. Reconnect with spirituality amidst the majestic Himalayas and holy rivers.

itinerary.title: Arrival at Haridwar
itinerary.description: Arrive in Haridwar and visit Har Ki Pauri for Ganga Aarti.

itinerary.title: Journey to Barkot
itinerary.description: Drive to Barkot via Mussoorie and check in at the hotel.

itinerary.title: Yamunotri Darshan
itinerary.description: Drive to Janki Chatti and trek to Yamunotri Temple. Return to Barkot.

itinerary.title: Travel to Uttarkashi
itinerary.description: Head to Uttarkashi, visit Kashi Vishwanath Temple.

itinerary.title: Gangotri Darshan
itinerary.description: Visit Gangotri Temple and return to Uttarkashi.

itinerary.title: Guptkashi via Tehri
itinerary.description: Drive to Guptkashi via scenic Tehri Lake. Overnight in Phata/Guptkashi.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath Trek
itinerary.description: Drive to Gaurikund and trek to Kedarnath. Overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Return to Guptkashi
itinerary.description: Return trek from Kedarnath to Gaurikund, drive back to Guptkashi.

itinerary.title: Visit Badrinath
itinerary.description: Travel to Badrinath, visit the temple and Mana Village.

itinerary.title: Return Journey
itinerary.description: Depart for Haridwar. Tour ends with spiritual memories.

packages.name: Thailand Explorer
packages.description: Dive into Thailand's best with this 8-day journey through Phuket, Krabi, Bangkok, and Pattaya. From dazzling temples and cultural sites to exotic beaches and vibrant nightlife, this tour promises adventure and relaxation in equal measure.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Phuket
itinerary.description: Check into your hotel and visit The Big Buddha, Chaitharaman Temple, and enjoy the Phuket FantaSea show.

itinerary.title: Explore Phuket
itinerary.description: Discover Patong, visit the Tiger Kingdom, shop in local markets, and enjoy Phuket's nightlife.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Krabi
itinerary.description: Travel to Krabi, visit the Tiger Cave Temple, and explore the local area.

itinerary.title: Islands & Nature
itinerary.description: Visit Phi Phi Island, Krabi Elephant Sanctuary, and Wat Kaew Korawaram.

itinerary.title: Travel to Bangkok
itinerary.description: Arrive in Bangkok and visit Wat Arun, Emerald Buddha Temple, and enjoy vibrant city life.

itinerary.title: Bangkok Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Explore the Grand Palace, Ocean World, Dream World, and other attractions.

itinerary.title: Pattaya Day Tour
itinerary.description: Travel to Pattaya and visit Frost Magical Ice of Siam, Sanctuary of Truth, Dolphin World, and more.

itinerary.title: Coral Island & Departure
itinerary.description: Visit Coral Island and Lan Pho Na Kluea Market. Departure from Thailand to India.

packages.name: Kashmir of the West
packages.description: Discover why Silvassa is known as the 'Kashmir of the West' with this 2-day itinerary. Explore serene lakes, lush gardens, tribal heritage, and exciting wildlife adventures â€” a perfect weekend escape.

itinerary.title: Silvassa â€“ Tribal Culture & Nature Trails
itinerary.description: Immerse yourself in Silvassa's culture and nature by visiting Nakshatra Van, Tribal Cultural Museum, and the peaceful Vanganga Garden.

itinerary.title: Dudhani â€“ Lakeside Bliss & Adventure
itinerary.description: Experience the charm of Dudhani with a visit to Dudhani Lake, Madhuban Dam, and the thrilling Vasona Lion Safari Park.
